'''Path of Gleaming Jade''' is a [[Login Event]] in [[Version 3.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2022/10/14 04:00:00 – 2022/10/31 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 5 or above

===Summary===
* During the event, log in on 7 days in total to receive {{Item|Intertwined Fate|x=10}} and other rewards!
